title: (x) Inky Script - various suggestions {Tamas, Mike Y}
content:
I realize that this is probably written by hand and it's not an existing font.  
But if it, please help me identify it. Or can you recommend similar fonts ?

[http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/2987/scriptq.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829180908/http:/img19.imageshack.us/img19/2987/scriptq.jpg "http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/2987/scriptq.jpg")
author: N1kkel

comments.content: Do you need a connected script? If not, how about [Ink Bleed](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829180908/http:/www.dafont.com/ink-bleed.font?nb_ppp=50&text=inky+script)

You are right, it seems, that this is hand-drawn, judging from how identical letters are so varied. In addition to Tamas's suggestion, you could look at [Part 14 (Distressed Scripts) of the Script Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829180908/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script14Pg1.html) for similar messy, blobby scripts.

- Mike Yanega

Thank you guys for the suggestions. I will use them as inspiration for my project. I decided that if you need this kind of lettering it will be best if you draw it yourself.  
Best wishes.

That sounds like a good decision. Have your own look.

- Mike Yanega
